Name: Miguel √Ångel
description:
Miguell is 27 years old. He went to school up to high school. He has a partner and a daughter. His partner is employed at a supermarket.

Miguel has been earning a living in cattle ranching and agriculture for 10 years. He learned these professions on his own initiative. He has his corral at his house, and his brother helps him to take care of the animals. Miguel also works loading vehicles with construction materials in his free time.

Miguel needs a loan to purchase two bulls to raise since it will help him to continue growing his livestock business. His dream is that his daughter grows up healthy, goes to school, and excels in life. In addition, he hopes to have good results from his cattle ranching.
